name: conversations.externalInvitePermissions.set
desc: Upgrade or downgrade Slack Connect channel permissions between 'can post only' and 'can post and invite'.

action.desc: Type of action to be taken: upgrade or downgrade.

channel.desc: The channel ID to change external invite permissions for.

target_team.desc: The encoded team ID of the target team.  Must be in the specified channel.

errors.not_supported: Attempting to upgrade a channel that cannot be upgraded
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the user from taking this action.
errors.invalid_target_team: The target team provided is not valid for the channel.
errors.invalid_action: The user did not provid a valid action. Valid actions are 'upgrade' or 'downgrade'.
